title: True Night's Edge
summaries: The True Night's Edge is a Hardmode sword that is a stronger version of the Night's Edge, doing more damage and firing a projectile when swung. It is one of the ingredients necessary to craft the Terra Blade. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop, [img:Console version] Console, [img:Mobile version] Mobile, and 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] versions, the True Night's Edge is capable of autoswing.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, the sword itself has a large aura of dark energy around the blade when swung, which significantly increases the range at which the weapon can deal damage to enemies, including coverage behind the player. Each time the sword swings, a projectile resembling a spinning disc of energy will be fired. The projectile will move relative to the player, staying on the same course on the screen as the player moves. The projectile deals 50% base damage (35 base damage), and strikes up to 3 times. The projectile applies 10 ticks of immunity frames on the target it hits, and is possible to hit the same target for multiple times (e.g. if the target is large enough for the projectiles to still stay on it after 10 ticks). If the blade or its aura strikes an enemy, a purple flash is created. If its projectile strikes an enemy, a green flash is created.

On the <linked>[img:Old-gen console version]</linked><linked> Old-gen console version</linked> and <linked>Nintendo 3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked><linked> version</linked>, when the sword is swinging, a glowing, spinning, green sword-shaped Night Beam projectile is fired at the cursor about every 0.86 seconds by default. The Night Beam projectiles deal 100% base damage (78 base damage). The fire rate can be increased by <linked>melee speed</linked> bonuses.
(Old-gen console and 3DS versions) The sword also has the highest base damage of any pre-Plantera sword.
